entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -34.6°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
